message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, $12,000 is quite high.  I'm interested but only willing to pay around $6,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 represents the value I place on it, I'm willing to come down to $10,000. I'm confident you'll find it's a fair offer considering the product's worth.
Thanks for coming down, Alice.  To be honest, $8,000 is really the highest I can go. Let me know if that works for you.
